text: Garlin Gilchrist II (born September 25, 1982) is an American politician, engineer, entrepreneur, and activist. He is the 64th lieutenant governor of Michigan, since January 2019. He is a member of the Democratic Party. In March 2025, Gilchrist announced his candidacy for governor of Michigan in the 2026 gubernatorial election. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Michigan Category:Engineers from Michigan Category:American political activists Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Businesspeople from Detroit Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians
title: Garlin Gilchrist
